forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
